comment: She is one of the best professor for chemistry. The exams are really similar to the practice tests. She is very friendly and will work through any questions you asked. Really recommend her!

By far one of the best proffesors in KSU, she makes class engaging with games and always encourages questions. She solves any problems you have one by one, and doesn't mind working with you on extra problems you may struggle with. CHEM 1211 is known to be hard, but during my semester with Prof Marshall I barley had to worry.

Professor Marshall is an amazing person. She cares a lot about her class. She checks attendance by doing these "clicker questions" which is a completion grade in the form of a Microsoft Forms question on the material we are learning that day but she posts the slides before the class so you can do it from home. Absolutely take her she is phenomenal.

The professor is very caring and understanding. Her lectures were easy to follow along and she always posted the slideshows. She's always open to questions and does a review session before each test. The practice exams are exactly like the tests. The homework was normal and pretty easy. Overall, just pay attention in class in you'll pass.

She is a nice person and will help you. She will explain things in class and is willing to answer a lot of questions during her lecture. However, there is barley any extra credit. I think theres two assignments that are extra credit and it's barely worth anything. Look at every practice exam they are similar to the test but not the same. Just study

Hated chem but Prof Madalynn is the goat legend and all of the above. Seriously explained everything in such an easy way to understand. If you do all the practice tests, you'll easily pass this class.
Prof is super sweet and willing to explain every question if you ask. Her tests are not so bad, and she has homework every week (very doable). I highly reccommend her!

Dr. Marshall really cares about her students, and will take a big chunk out of her lecture to help individuals with questions. The tests weren't incredibly hard, and homework was normal, however make sure you study for the final since it is brutally difficult compared to her normal tests.This is an easy class if you take notes and do the homework.

You can tell Dr. Marshall really cares about her students. Her lectures and slideshows made understanding the material a breeze, and she was always willing to answer questions during class. The tests weren't too bad as long as you paid attention and did the practice exams.
